actions.description: The canoloth makes one Bite or Tongue attack and one Claw attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15), pulled up to 30 feet toward the canoloth, and restrained until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.
actions.name: Tongue

name: Canoloth [MoM]
resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted.
specialTraits.name: Dimensional Lock

specialTraits.description: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The canoloth can't be surprised unless it's incapacitated.
specialTraits.name: Uncanny Senses
